discourse_list.title: Content Production Bi-Weekly Update: June 10 - June 24, 2021

content.content: Greetings from the Content Production Core Unit! Previous updates have focused on our actual content production but some comments were made on our last update about the team’s output so we’re switching up the format to try and be more transparent about all of the work we’ve been doing to get the team up and running.  Administrative Updates The topic of legal protection has recently been raised (here and here) so I want to address the fact that we’ve formed an LLC to protect contributors from personal liability. We’ve put a lot of effort into understanding what it takes to accommodate candidates who prefer to enjoy the perks of traditional employment rather than a higher pay rate (healthcare/insurance, w2 instead of 1099, 401k, etc.).  Set up accounting Set up a business bank account Created job ads and conducted interviews for three positions Hired and started onboarding one writer and one video producer Made an offer to a social media/community manager   Content Production We’ve created a dashboard to track the Requests for Comment we’ve received from the community. Please note this is not an exhaustive list of the content the team is producing; just the work we’re collaborating on with other Core Units.  Met with dTalent (being incubated by SES) to support the development of a Talent Portal. Published video, audio, and a transcription of the AMA with William Remor of Real-World Finance Hosted a discussion on marketing and product development  Transcribed What the World is Doing With Dai Featuring CurioInvest Met with SES to discuss needs around the Community Portal Published Maker Relay Ep 49 and Ep 50  Started planning updates to the Community Portal   Looking Ahead In the coming weeks, we’ll be:  Announcing details of the Mascot Logo Contest to decide between the Capybara and Dragon for MakerDAO’s mascot Continuing work on the Community Portal Starting to work on the production of educational videos Hosting an AMA on Centrifuge and Tinlake With Lea, Lucas, and Martin Strategizing with GovComms to expand the scope of Maker Relay And more!  As always, check out our Transparency Dashboard 13 to see what we’re working on and please join us for our weekly Office Hours on Tuesdays at 14:30 UTC.

seth:  The topic of legal protection has recently been raised (here and here) so I want to address the fact that we’ve formed an LLC to protect contributors from personal liability.   I’m glad to read that and to be part of the idea of its elaboration, congratulations guys.

Dude how do I make a request for a Video on how to deploy a Keeper via Liquidations 2.0? you know how Mooney & the PE squad have been saying its easier now to deploy… would be nice if there was a step by step Vid. I can’t find a way to request such on that “request for content” link you posted.

You just did! We’re just asking people to DM me with content requests until we can get a form or something set up but I’ve added it to the list. I know we’ve gotten a request for a video about Liquidations 2.0 (soon-to-be 2.1) but I don’t believe we’ve had one about Keepers.
